attributes.action: end the inspection of passports held by  British Citizens at UK airports and ports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Page one of a British passport says "Her Britannic Majesty's Secretary of State Requests and requires in the Name of Her Majesty all those whom it may concern to allow the bearer to pass freely without let or hindrance, and to afford to the bearer such assistance and protection as may be necessary"

Sign this petition if you believe that the right to pass freely "without let or hindrance" is a fundamental and unconditional right of British citizenship and to this end the holders of British Passports should not be delayed at UK airports and ports by passport checks.  British Citizens should enjoy the same level of free and unhindered passage across our own border as we enjoy when crossing other borders within Europe, where no checks are required.
